reviews.review_msg: An over-qualified academic whose failing is that he cannot 'lower' himself to his student's level - he acts as if all his students understand the subject already. His passion is clear, he's generally nice, but his 'help' is often vague and he DOES have quite the temper if irked. Very tough course with a professor of dubious 'teaching' quality.
great prof, but he uses long words take a dictionary to class
